modules.description: Validates botanical names and returns current nomenclature status
Determines if plant species is native to Southeast Michigan
Discovers URLs for plant species across botanical reference websites
Identifies all common/vernacular names used in Southeast Michigan and adjacent regions
Retrieves botanical synonyms (legacy binomial names) from GBIF for cross-reference purposes
Retrieves ecological metrics from Michigan Flora dataset: C value, wetness, growth form, and life cycle
Appends Wikipedia URL to references, adds SE Michigan observation histogram and Wikipedia summary from iNaturalist
Discovers BONAP county-level range map image URL
Syncs Google Drive parsed PDF files to local cache for Lake County data
Extracts image filenames from Lake County parsed PDF JSON files
Identifies similar species and distinguishing features using tiered source-backed and inferred data
